message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a one-time offer for $10000. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll send it your way.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, I'll pass on this one.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is indeed of the highest quality. I'm willing to offer you a 'quality guarantee': if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't need it. The price remains $10000. What do you say?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm not convinced that the product is high-quality. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your skepticism, but I want to provide more evidence. I'm willing to give you a detailed description of the product's features and specifications. If you're still unsure, I can even provide a review from a satisfied customer who has purchased a similar product from me in the past. The price remains $10000, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny. What do you think?
I appreciate the extra information, but it doesn't change my initial impression. I'll pass on this one.

I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator! Okay, let's try something different. I'll give you a 'price concession' for this round only: I'll give you a 5% discount on the price, bringing it down to $9500. This is the lowest price I can offer, and I'm still confident you'll love the product. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the risk, I'll buy the product at the discounted price of $9500.

Great decision! I'm glad you took the chance on the previous product. Now, let's talk about this new one. Since you've already shown a willingness to take a calculated risk, I'm willing to offer you an 'exclusive deal'. I'll give you a second chance to buy a high-quality product at the same price of $10000, with the same quality guarantee as before. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product even more than the last one. What do you say?
I'm not going to fall for the same trick twice. I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're cautious, but I want to assure you that this product is different. I'm willing to make a 'bet' with you. If you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll not only give you a full refund but also give you a second high-quality product of your choice, absolutely free. This is a unique opportunity to get two high-quality products for the price of one. What do you think?
I'm not convinced by the 'bet' offer. I'll pass on this one.

I know you're a savvy buyer, and I respect that. However, I want to be transparent with you. This product is not one of my best. It's a lower-end model, and I'm offering it to you at a discounted price of $8000. I'm not making a profit on this one, and I'm willing to let it go for a song. It's a great opportunity to get a good deal on a product that still has some value. What do you say?
I'll take a chance on the discounted product. I'll buy it for $8000.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! Now, let's talk about this new one. This product is a step up from the previous one, but not as high-end as my premium offerings. I'll give you a price of $9000, which is a compromise between the two. I think you'll find it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. What do you say?
I'm not going to take another chance on a product without knowing its quality. I'll pass on this one.

The price remains $10000, but I think you'll find the added value is well worth it. What do you say?
The free setup and training session is nice, but it's not enough to convince me to buy a product without knowing its quality. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not interested in the stepping stone product, and I'm not willing to pay $9000 for a high-quality product without knowing its quality. I'll pass on this one.
